body_html: If tf.layers would be removed later, what should I use in the future? Is there any Tensorflow based middle level package like slim but supported officially by Google in later versions? I mean "pure tensorflow package", but not Keras.
body_text: If tf.layers would be removed later, what should I use in the future? Is there any Tensorflow based middle level package like slim but supported officially by Google in later versions? I mean "pure tensorflow package", but not Keras.
body: If tf.layers would be removed later, what should I use in the future? Is there any Tensorflow based middle level package like slim but supported officially by Google in later versions? I mean "pure tensorflow package", but not Keras.
